description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows client-side caching elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-43644), you should apply the relevant updates for your system. Follow these steps:

1. Identify your Windows version using the build numbers listed below.
2. Download and install the applicable update from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
3. Restart your system to ensure all changes are applied.

**Details**:
- This update addresses an out-of-bounds read vulnerability that could allow elevation of privilege.
- Ensure you are using Windows 10 or Windows 11 as noted in the build numbers.

**Preconditions**:
- Backup critical data before proceeding to update.
- Verify system compatibility with the updates from the links provided below.

**Update Packages**:
- [KB5046613](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046613)
- [KB5046617](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046617)
- [KB5046633](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046633)
- [KB5046665](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046665)

**Build Numbers**:
- Windows 11 Version 24H2: 10.0.26100.2314
- Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.4460
- Windows 11 Version 22H2: 10.0.22621.4460
- Windows 10 Versions: 10.0.19044.5131, 10.0.19045.5131, 10.0.10240.20826.
(Note: Make sure to match your system architecture (x64 or 32-bit) with the corresponding updates.)
